short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get discounts and collect donations for your favorite cause when shopping at 1000+ participating stores

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The CauseNetwork Web App automatically collects donations for your favorite charity from 1,000 participating online stores.  Up to 10% of your purchase is automatically donated to your charity once you complete your purchase.  Many stores also offer discounts and coupons so you can save money while helping raise money for worthy cause. Participation in CauseNetwork is FREE to consumers and charities and there are no hidden costs or additional markups when you shop - Everything is paid for by our network of 1,000 online stores who want to demonstrate they are socially responsible by making a donation to a charity that you care about.  

The Web App also has links for donating used electronics, donating used vehicles & more.  Sign up for a FREE account on our mobile app or by visit http://www.CauseNetwork.com.  Start saving money while collecting donations for your favorite cause!

P.S. If you are involved with fund raising for a cause, you can register your cause for FREE at http://my.CauseNetwork.com/causes and have online shoppers collect donations for your cause as well!
